question: Which user (AadUserId) was potentially trying to hide the usage of a dual-purpose tool under an unexpected filename?
solution_steps: Suspicious access to LSASS service was attempted using the process `powershell.exe`.
There were suspicious exploration activities on host `mb-adfs`.
An attempt to hide the use of a dual-purpose tool was detected for the user with AadUserId `ec3ec68b-fdeb-4fe4-9a29-acd445e1ccc5`.
